akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 103–359, title VIII, § 806(b)(2), Oct. 14, 1994, 108 Stat. 3442

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3615. Repealed. Pub. L. 103–359, title VIII, § 806(b)(2), Oct. 14, 1994, 108 Stat. 3442
Section, Pub. L. 86–36, § 17, as added Pub. L. 102–88, title V, § 503, Aug. 14, 1991, 105 Stat. 436, related to post-employment assistance for certain National Security Agency employees.
Section was formerly classified in a note under section 402 of this title and repealed prior to editorial reclassification as this section.
Another section 17 of Pub. L. 86–36 was renumbered section 18 and is classified to section 3616 of this title.
